title: But It's Been Months
author: Me
citation: Me. "But It's Been Months: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 77803)". Erowid.org. Apr 2, 2009. erowid.org/exp/77803
report: I just tested positive for trace amounts of opiates, which I have not taken for at least a few months. However, for 4-5 days before the test I had 60mg/d DXM (dextromethorphan). I suspect this to be the culprit, otherwise I had only consumed some phenethylamines and 2cb.
